alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 1:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Calhoun and Ouachita Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 154 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chidester, or 12 miles northwest of Camden, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camden... Stephens... Chidester... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... White Oak Lake State Park... East Camden... Delhi... Harmony Grove... Frenchport... Elliot... Fairview in Ouachita County... Troy... Locust Bayou... Warner... Bragg City... Buena Vista... Reader... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
